home_subtitle: — a passionate web developer in the making.
home_intro1: I love turning ideas into interactive websites and am constantly exploring new technologies.
home_intro2: From paperwork to programming — I’ve found joy in solving problems with code and creating meaningful digital experiences.
about_p1: Hi, I’m Julia — a former HR professional now pursuing web development in Vancouver.
about_p2: I enjoy turning ideas into interactive websites and solving problems with clean, user-friendly code.
about_p3: With a background in business and a passion for learning, I’m currently studying at CICCC to sharpen my front-end and back-end skills.
about_p4: My dream is to become a digital nomad and build meaningful, accessible web experiences.
